name: MoneyMath
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: money math
des:
Money Math is a game for kids and adults of all ages. Practice and improve your mental math and skills with money in this fun quiz game.

Questions include calculating change, taking percentages, and adding and subtracting money values. Compete for a high score and try and beat your family and friends.

The goal of Money Math is to help make math practical and enjoyable for kids, students, and even adults. Mental math skills with money are extremely important in day to day life. Spend some time with Money Math to improve your skills today!

To play the game, say 'Alexa, money math.' Then say 'play' and answer the questions by saying '10 dollars and 47 cents.'
